data.title: Ancestors of Angela Booth
data.text:
13th Generation

4224. John BOWER, son of John BOWER and Agnes, died on 2 MAR 1590/91 in Bridlington, ERY and was buried on 14 MAR 1590/91 in Bridlington Priory, ERY.

John married Emma SKYNNER on 30 JAN 1569/70 in Bridlington, ERY.

Children from this marriage were:

2112 i. John BOWER (christened on 18 FEB 1570/71 in Bridlington, ERY - died on 16 DEC 1611 in Bridlington, ERY)

ii. William BOWER

John next married Margaret WATSON on 5 JAN 1576 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY. Margaret was buried on 9 SEP 1591 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY.

Children from this marriage were:

i. Thomas BOWER (christened on 30 MAR 1581 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

ii. Margaret BOWER (christened on 26 JAN 1582/83 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

4225. Emma SKYNNER .

Emma married John BOWER from 30 JAN 1569 to 30 JAN 1570 in Bridlington, ERY. John died on 2 MAR 1590/91 in Bridlington, ERY and was buried on 14 MAR 1590/91 in Bridlington Priory, ERY.

4226. John BOYNFEYLD, son of Nicholas BOYNFEYLD and Unknown, was buried on 13 FEB 1592/93 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY.

John married Alyson. Alyson was buried on 22 OCT 1591 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY.

Children from this marriage were:

i. John BOYNFEYLD (christened on 2 FEB 1567/68 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

2113 ii. Jeane BOYNFEYLD (christened on 28 FEB 1568/69, born in Bridlington, ERY - died in Bridlington, ERY)

iii. William BOYNFEYLD (buried on 12 MAR 1572/73 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

iv. Margaret BOYNFEYLD (christened on 12 DEC 1572 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

v. Percival BOYNFEYLD (christened on 10 DEC 1573 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY - buried on 14 SEP 1586 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY)

vi. Nicholas BOYNFEYLD

4227. Alyson was buried on 22 OCT 1591 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY.

Alyson married John BOYNFEYLD. John was buried on 13 FEB 1592/93 in Bridlington Priory, Bridlington, ERY.

4240. Robert BELT .

Robert married.

His children were:

2120 i. Lancelot (Leonard) BELT (born about 1548, possibly in Stillingfleet, NRY - buried on 5 AUG 1590 buried in St Crux, York, NRY)

ii. Mark BELT

iii. BELT

4242. William BECKWITH, son of John BECKWITH and unknown, died on 31 JUL 1586 in St Crux, York, NRY and was buried on 1 AUG 1586 in St Crux, York, NRY.

Noted events in his life were:

 He was an Alderman in York.

William married Alice RACE on 7 DEC 1548 in St Crux, York, NRY. Alice died on 16 AUG 1598 in St Crux, York, NRY.

Children from this marriage were:

2121 i. Mary BECKWITH (christened on 25 AUG 1554 in St Crux, York, NRY - died on 14 DEC 1622 in St Crux, York, NRY)

ii. Leonard BECKWITH (died on 24 JAN 1614/15)

iii. Robert BECKWITH (died on 15 APR 1585 in York)

iv. Christopher BECKWITH

v. Alice BECKWITH

4243. Alice RACE died on 16 AUG 1598 in St Crux, York, NRY.

Alice married William BECKWITH on 7 DEC 1548 in St Crux, York, NRY. William died on 31 JUL 1586 in St Crux, York, NRY and was buried on 1 AUG 1586 in St Crux, York, NRY.

James married Elizabeth WOODHEAD. Elizabeth was buried on 15 SEP 1587 in Halifax, WRY.

Children from this marriage were:

i. Thomas FOXCROFT

ii. Richard FOXCROFT

iii. Samuel FOXCROFT

ix. Elizabeth FOXCROFT

x. Grace FOXCROFT

Elizabeth married James FOXCROFT. James was buried on 5 NOV 1569 in Halifax, WRY.

Alison married Anthony CROSBY. Anthony died in 1599 in Wheldrake, ERY.

William married Constance LAMBERT on 9 NOV 1578. Constance was christened on 12 JAN 1562 in Holme Upon Spalding Moor, NRY and died on 14 NOV 1622 in Holme Upon Spalding Moor, NRY at age 60.

Children from this marriage were:

i. Isabel SOTHERON (christened on 1 FEB 1579/80 in Holme upon Spalding Moor, NRY)

vii. Phillippa SOTHERON (born in 1597 in Holme upon Spalding Moor, NRY)

Constance married William SOTHERON on 9 NOV 1578. William was christened on 12 AUG 1560 in Aslackby, LIN and died in 1619 in Holme Upon Spalding Moor, NRY at age 59.

vii. Edwin NICHOLSON (christened on 23 FEB 1577/78 in Hawkshead, LAN)

viii. Rowland NICHOLSON (born on 26 AUG 1579 in Hawkshead, LAN - died on 26 AUG 1579 in Hawkshead, LAN)

Rowland next married Elizabeth SANDES on 12 NOV 1580 in Hawkshead, LAN. Elizabeth was buried on 7 MAY 1601 in Hawkshead, LAN.

The child from this marriage was:

i. NICHOLSON (buried on 26 JUL 1582 in Hawkshead, LAN)

4313. Margaret was buried on 27 AUG 1579 in Hawkshead, LAN.

Margaret married Rowland NICHOLSON. Rowland was buried on 9 JUN 1590 in Hawkshead, LAN.

Radigunda married Daniel HOECHSTETTER in 1553 in Regensburg Stadt, Oberpfalz, Bayern, GERMANY. Daniel was born in Germany.
